introduction.title: Hi there! Welcome
introduction.text: IÂ´m a Full Stack Developer. Design and usability enthusiast, I enjoy crafting high-quality web solutions and delivering outstanding user experiences. Have a look at my works and if you have any query, feel free to reach out!

about_me.intro: Passionate Full Stack Developer. Raised in a generation surrounded by the expansion of Internet, I became curious about coding, so I started my research with tutorials and the vast amount of free materials available on the web. In 2023, I made the decision to formalize my studies. Always striving to deliver more than expected, I appreciate the world of development and coding for its challenges and continuous growth. I currently work as Full Stack Mentor at 4Geeks Academy. Take a look at my skills.
